org.drools.brms.client.ruleeditor
Class AssetCategoryEditor

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget

              org.drools.brms.client.common.DirtyableComposite
                  org.drools.brms.client.ruleeditor.AssetCategoryEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, DirtyableWidget, IDirtyable
public class AssetCategoryEditor
extends DirtyableComposite

This is a viewer/editor for categories. It will show a list of categories currently applicable, and allow you to remove/add to them. It is intended to work with the meta data form.
